transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, haan ji madam aapki call aa rahi thi.
Customer: Ji good evening sir, kaise ho?
Executive: Main theek hoon, haan Shruti, achha Shruti?
Customer: Haan sir, main Shruti baat kar rahi hoon. Actually kya hai na ki woh us din ticket raise hai na is wajah se aapko dusre number se call aa raha hoga. Hamara matlab yeh jab ticket assign ho jata hai na toh hamara jo dusra virtual number hai na uske through call jaane lagta hai. Isliye maine aapko WhatsApp pe message, actually maine aapko WhatsApp pe message kiya.
Customer: Haan woh maine dekh liya tha. Haan haan batao.
Executive: Haan sir aap batao kaise chal raha hai sab?
Customer: Kaam waam kaise chal raha hai?
Executive: Woh weather ki, weather ki. Soil moisture sensors ki toh aur meters ki toh inquiries aa rahi hain. Magar weather station ki toh kai din se ek bhi inquiry nahi aayi hai.
Customer: Achha ek bhi nahi aayi hai?
Customer: Ek bhi nahi aayi hai. Main har roz usko dekhta hoon magar kahin koi mujhe mil hi nahi rahi weather station ki kisi bhi tarah ki.
Executive: Theek hai sir, weather station na?
Executive: Sir actually kya hai na, pichle do mahine se na inquiry bahut drop ho gaya hai uske particularly category ka. Is wajah se aapko lead nahi mil rahi hai. Mujhe I hope ki matlab aapko pichle mahine yeh face karna pada hoga ki lead nahi, buy leads nahi mil rahi aapko, right?
Customer: Haan haan haan haan.
Executive: Haan sir, abhi tak toh aapke matlab abhi teen din ho gaye na, abhi tak aapke is product line mein zero inquiry approve ho ke aayi hai.
Customer: Haan haan, haan bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Haan aur pichle mahine mein thodi kam aayi thi is wajah se aapko yeh challenges face karna pada hoga. Actually iska kuch season wagera hota hai kya particularly?
Customer: Nahi aisa toh kuch nahi weather, nahi nahi weather stations toh jo agriculture universities hain woh kabhi bhi laga sakti hain kyunki unko hamesha hi data chahiye. Aur bahut sari inquiries jo aati hain woh normally agriculture universities ki hoti hain aur jo log unke saath deal karte hain, vendors hote hain, unki woh inquiries hoti hain jo humein woh bhej dete hain ki bhai taaki hum aage woh aage supply kar sakein. Unki requirement ko puri kar sakein. Toh yeh maloom nahi hai ki aisa ya toh Diwali ki chuttiyan wagera thi, staff wagera apna jo bhi faculties hain woh chutti par thi. Mujhe nahi maloom aisa kyun hua ki ab kuch samay se bilkul jaise akaal sa pad gaya weather stations ki inquiries ka.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Sir abhi do mahine se na lead kam aa rahi hai. Isliye maine abhi matlab us time se toh maine dekha nahi tha abhi chutti chal rahi thi na. Toh maine ghar pe hi thi abhi just join hi ki hoon toh maine socha ek baar connect kar loon. Plus us din jo aapke saath baat hui thi. Haan haan. Haan woh lead nahi aa rahi hai. Main, main wohi, main roz dekhta hoon IndiaMART aur mujhe soil moistures ki toh inquiries mil rahi hain. Magar abhi tak mujhe woh weather stations ki isko kaise aap kuch aage promote kar sakte hain, kuch ho sakta hai toh aap dekhiye.
Executive: Haan haan sir, actually kya hai na bataya toh aapko ki past ke do month se inquiry hi kam aa rahi hai toh isme aap kaise purchase karoge. Jo aa rahi hogi woh bhi consume ho ja rahi hogi. Us particular time pe jab aap available ho us time toh inquiry milna mushkil hai na. Jab aap aao online aur usi time woh inquiry dikhe tab tak woh sold out ki problem ho ja rahi hogi.
Customer: [laughter]
Executive: Hai na? Toh ek bari. Haan sir main ek dekhthi hoon. Ek bari aap kal, haan kal morning mein aap kab tak free ho?
Customer: Uh, main aapko call kar lunga.
Executive: Haan koi baat nahi.
Customer: Haan I will try to call you. Jaise hi main free hota hoon toh I will call you back.
Executive: Haan is number pe call back karu main aapko?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi sir yeh kya hai na jaise abhi aapko us din call kiya tha na maine ki jo bhi hamari weather stations hai uski listing kam ho gayi hai kyunki hum logon ne past mein abhi kuch dino se lead hi consume kari hai. Toh uska toh matlab lead hi nahi aa rahi toh consume kaise karoge aap. Lekin sir yeh jo hai na totally AI based hai. Har month, har week aapka yeh progress hota hai. Toh aapne past ke do teen weeks mein aapne lead hi consume ki hogi toh uski listing degrade ho gayi. Is wajah se na woh ticket aata hai ki humein usse aap client se ya toh do reasons hote hain sir ya toh client jo hote hain woh lead hi nahi consume karte hain nahi toh yahan pe lead hi nahi milti isliye consume nahi kar rahe kyunki isme dekho ya toh client bahut zyada busy hai toh woh nahi consume kar pa raha aur nahi toh second reason yeh hota hai ki lead hi nahi aayi toh kaise aap consume karoge. Jo aayi woh bhi sold out ho gayi hogi possibly.
Customer: Haan koi baat nahi dekhte hain phir usko.
Executive: Haan toh iski wajah se na CRT number hota hai hamara toh us pe us pe aapko call jaati hai. Is pe kya likh ke aa raha tha aapke paas number?
Customer: Nahi is pe toh aa raha hai IndiaMART Help.
Executive: IndiaMART Help, Help, Help, Help. Haan haan woh sir hamara matlab help ke liye as a customer care, as a executive as a hum log hai na aapko dekhne ke liye. Toh is wajah se aapko pichli baar kaam bhi karaya tha lekin sir woh hua nahi toh mujhe kal phir se aapke saath baith ke kaam karana padega isliye puch rahi hoon ki aap kab kab tak available ho payenge?
Customer: Main, main aapko bata dunga subah ko call back kar dunga.
Executive: Haan ek baar call back kar lijiyega aur mujhe bata dijiyega time bata dijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai chalo okay okay thank you sir okay thank you.
Executive: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving weather station inquiries.

- Inquiries for soil moisture sensors are coming.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the reason for low inquiries.

- Executive said she will connect again to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back executive in the morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, weather station, inquiries, listing
